tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE budget_tracking (
    budget_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID NOT NULL,
    budget_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    budget_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_customer_id FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE budgets (
    budget_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    budget_name VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE financial_goals (
    goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    goal_name VARCHAR(255),
    target_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    current_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE budgets (
  budget_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  budget_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  budget_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  budget_end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_goals (
  goal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  goal_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  goal_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  goal_completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Budgets (
    budget_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    budget_name VARCHAR(50),
    budget_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialGoals (
    goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    goal_name VARCHAR(50),
    goal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    target_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    notes TEXT
);
